short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Spy on your competitor's ads by saving their ads from the Ads library and other sources

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
✓ Used by 100+ marketers
✓ 300,000+ ads saved till date
✓ Save winning ad inspo from the Facebook Ad library, and +4 other sources.
✓ Get insights inside your competitor’s ad strategies
✓ Organize winning ads into moodboards and share them with your creators, editors, etc.

"Swipekit has streamlined our process of creating high-performing creatives and has become our go-to tool for mood boards and ad inspiration."
- Simon, Director @ welcometodigital.co.uk

** What sources can I save ads from using Swipekit?
We support:
- Facebook Ad library
- Tiktok Creative Center(includes top ads)
- Tiktok ad library(Tiktok organic isn't supported but will be soon in the future)
- Google ad transparency page
- Linkedin ad library
- Pinterest ad library

** What is the Brand Tracker?
Swipekit Brand Tracker automatically tracks a brand's ads on the Facebook Ad library.
Use it to:
- Scrape competitor ads automatically
- Get valuable insights of a brand over time, eg: which landing pages are they driving traffic to, what common words are they using in their ad copy, their mix of asset types, etc.

** Why use Swipekit?
- Battle tested. Our extension will save every creative from any ad inside the facebook ad library. We have saved a TON of ads till date. 
- Reliable and stable. We've been at this for 2+ years and know a thing or two about scraping ads.
- Affordable for solo marketers and early-stage performance agencies - but we don’t compromise on support and feature updates.

** Do you have any examples?
Here are some high performing static ads saved with Swipekit:
https://swipekit.app/boards/high-performing-static-ads

Another one showcasing b2b(primarily linkedin) ads:
https://swipekit.app/boards/b2b-linkedin-ads

** Faqs:
- Is this a paid product
Yes it is. We offer a generous trial period though.

- Are the ads stored forever in my account
Yes they are.

- How much do you charge?
Please visit swipekit.app for pricing information.

**For detailed insights and more features, visit swipekit.app
